resources.string: The figure will appear on the screen. Remember their location. After they disappear, display the location of these figures on the field.
The figure will appear on the screen 2 times with an interval in time. After they disappear, display the general layout, aligning the position of the figures at the first and second appearance.
The figure appears on the screen 2 times with a time interval. After they disappear, display the selected location (the location number will appear on the screen).
